response.original_title: The Beginner's Bible: The Story of The Nativity
response.overview: Created to help you share the most important lessons from the greatest stories ever told, The Beginner's Bible Series brings the true wonder and joy of the Bible to life. Featuring an original theme sung by Kathie Lee Gifford, memorable songs, vivid animation and heartwarming characters, this series is a delightful new way to introduce young children to the timeless stories of inspiration, courage and faith.  Relive the miraculous events surrounding the very first Christmas as Mary receives a heavenly visitor and learns that she, of all women, has been chosen to be the mother of God's son on Earth. Then, travel with Mary and Joseph to a lowly manger in Bethlehem, and marvel at the fulfillment of God's promise to His people as a heavenly host of angels proclaims the joyful news: Jesus Christ is born!
response.title: The Beginner's Bible: The Story of The Nativity
